The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Category:Hand items

Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Gloves
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Goggles
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Gloves, gauntlets etc.

You can wear gloves to cover your hand slot. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Ruby Encrusted Gauntlets
  • Flame StrikeFlame Strike
    Caster level: 15
    Charges: 1 (1/day)     — 1 Charges (Recharged/Day:1)
  • Fire Lore +11%Fire Lore +11: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a 11% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Radiance Lore +11%Radiance Lore +11: Passive: Your Light and Aligned spells gain a 11% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Combustion +73Combustion +73: Passive: +73 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.
  • Radiance +73Radiance +73: Passive: +73 Equipment bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.
 9 Bound to Character on Acquire, ExclusiveBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire
This is an Exclusive item. You may only carry one at a time. 		Plane of Night Raid Warded chest
Gloves of Deceit
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Bluff +7Bluff +7: Passive: +7 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lost Seekers
Linen Handwraps
  • Strength +4 Strength +4: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Curse of ClumsinessCurse of Clumsiness: Passive -1 Penalty to Dexterity. (The minimum level required to equip this item is lower than normal due to this curse.)
  • Proof Against Disease +6 Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 7 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Delera's Tomb
Gloves of the Poet
  • Heal +3Heal +3: Passive: +3 Competence bonus to the Heal skill.
  • Perform +3Perform +3: Passive: +3 Competence bonus to the Perform skill.
 None Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Seal of Shan-To-Kor
Blademaster Gauntlets
  • Strength +3 Strength +3: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +3 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Seven Fingered Gloves
  • Disable Device +11Disable Device +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Disable Device skill.
  • Open Lock +11Open Lock +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Open Lock skill.
  • Use Magic Device +5Use Magic Device +5: Passive: +5 Competence bonus to the Use Magic Device skill.
  • Arcane Casting DexterityArcane Casting Dexterity: This ability reduces the arcane spell failure chance by -10%.
 9 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Titan Awakes Raid Warded chest
Bramble-Casters
  • Blighted Lore +12%Blighted Lore +12: Passive: Your Acid, Negative, Poison and Evil spells gain a 12% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Power of the Blight +80Power of the Blight +80: Passive: +80 Equipment bonus to Acid, Negative, Poison and Evil Spell Power.
  • Spearblock VSpearblock V: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by 10, except from Bludgeoning or Slashing weapons. (Damage Reduction: 10/Slash, Bludgeon)
  • Greater Thorn GuardGreater Thorn Guard: This armor stings those that attack the wearer, causing 2d6 piercing damage on a successful melee attack.
  • The Desert's Starless NightsThe Desert's Starless Nights: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +2% Artifact bonus to Negative and Poison Spellcrit Chance
    +10 Artifact bonus to Negative and Poison Spellpower
    +5% Artifact bonus to Damage vs the Helpless
 11 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Zawabi's Revenge Raid Warded chest
Gloves of the Glacier
  • Glacial AssaultGlacial Assault: With 2 items equipped - Glaciation +72. With 3 items equipped - Glaciation +78
  • Efficient Metamagic - Maximize IIEfficient Metamagic - Maximize II: The additional spell point cost for using the Maximize Metamagic feat is reduced by 4 SP.
  • Efficient Metamagic - Extend IIEfficient Metamagic - Extend II: The additional spell point cost for using the Extend Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP.
 13 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire A Vision of Destruction End chest
Molb's Fist
  • Wizardry IIWizardry II: This item grants the wearer +50 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Efficient Metamagic - Enlarge IEfficient Metamagic - Enlarge I: The additional spell point cost for using the Enlarge Metamagic feat is reduced by 1 SP.
  • Ice Lore IIIIce Lore III: Passive: Your Cold spells gain a 13% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
 7 UnboundUnbound: This item is Unbound, and may take permanent damage. The Gate Chamber End chest
Cesti
  • Strength +3 Strength +3: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +3 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Dexterity +4 Dexterity +4: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

Vile Blasphemy
  • Power DrainPower Drain
    Caster level: 12
    Charges: 1 (1/day)     — 1 Charges (Recharged/Day:1)
  • Dexterity +6 Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Use Magic Device +3Use Magic Device +3: Passive: +3 Competence bonus to the Use Magic Device skill.
  • Upgradeable Item (Black Abbot)Upgradeable Item (Black Abbot): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Black Abbot to combine it with. Bring this item to the Fountain of Necrotic Might outside the Black Mausoleum and combine it with a Seal of the Black Abbot to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.

  • Dexterity +6 Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

Gauntlets of Eternity
  • Heal +13Heal +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Heal skill.
  • Repair +13Repair +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Repair skill.
  • Devotion +60Devotion +60: Passive: +60 Equipment bonus to Positive (Healing) Spell Power.
  • Healing Lore VHealing Lore V: Passive: Your Positive Energy spells gain a 15% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Eternal FaithEternal Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Eternal Faith increase the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, his maximum Hit Dice turned by +2, and his total Hit Dice turned by +4.
  • Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver)Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Stormreaver to combine it with. Bring this item to the Stormreaver Monument in Gianthold and combine it with a Seal of the Stormreaver to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.

Brawling Gloves (Level 12)
  • Upgradeable - Tier 1
  • Strength +4 Strength +4: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Spike-StuddedSpike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.
  • Glass Jaw StrikeGlass Jaw Strike: While wearing this item, when you roll a 20 on an unarmed attack, you will deal a tremendous blow to your target that will daze it (as the Sap ability) and may knock it down as well.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 2
      • Adds Sneak Attack Bonus +3Sneak Attack Bonus +3: Provides a +3 to attack bonus and a +5 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 3
      • Strength +4 Strength +4: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength. → Strength +5 Strength +5: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Strength.

Green Steel Weave Gloves
  • Taint of ShavarathTaint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons can sate their bloodlust on opponents, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed upon the wearer. Perhaps there is a way to cleanse this item...
 11 Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip Altar of Fecundity Manufactured Ingredient Recipes

  • Upgradeable - Tier 1
  • Spike-StuddedSpike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.
  • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Glass Jaw StrikeGlass Jaw Strike: While wearing this item, when you roll a 20 on an unarmed attack, you will deal a tremendous blow to your target that will daze it (as the Sap ability) and may knock it down as well.
  • Sneak Attack Bonus +4Sneak Attack Bonus +4: Provides a +4 to attack bonus and a +6 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 2
      • Strength +6 Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength. → Strength +7 Strength +7: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Strength.

  • Knight's LoyaltyKnight's Loyalty: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +3 artifact bonus to your To-Hit and Damage rolls, and a +3 Insight bonus to Natural Armor.

  • Improved Deception Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +5 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

  • Eternal FaithEternal Faith: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Eternal Faith increase the owner's effective level for the turning check by +2, his maximum Hit Dice turned by +2, and his total Hit Dice turned by +4.

  • Arcane Casting DexterityArcane Casting Dexterity: This ability reduces the arcane spell failure chance by -10%.
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.

Sanctified Gages
  • Scorching SunScorching Sun: On hit your weapons will do an additional 2d6 light damage.
  • Greater Dispelling GuardGreater Dispelling Guard: This item is infused with a power that purges out the magical energies of those that strike the wearer. When the wearer is hit in melee it will apply a Greater Dispel Magic effect to the attacker, stripping away its protective spells.

Epic Brawling Gloves (Level 24)
  • Upgradeable - Tier 1
  • Spike-StuddedSpike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.
  • Strength +7 Strength +7: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Glass Jaw StrikeGlass Jaw Strike: While wearing this item, when you roll a 20 on an unarmed attack, you will deal a tremendous blow to your target that will daze it (as the Sap ability) and may knock it down as well.
  • Sneak Attack Bonus +4Sneak Attack Bonus +4: Provides a +4 to attack bonus and a +6 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 2
      • Strength +7 Strength +7: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +7 enhancement bonus to Strength. → Strength +8 Strength +8: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Strength.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 3
      • Sneak Attack Bonus +4Sneak Attack Bonus +4: Provides a +4 to attack bonus and a +6 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue. → Sneak Attack Bonus +5Sneak Attack Bonus +5: Provides a +5 to attack bonus and a +8 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
      • Adds Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
        • Named: Category:Yellow augments
        • Deathblock

  • Doublestrike 15% Doublestrike 15%: Passive: 15% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
  • Armor-Piercing - 21% Armor-Piercing - 21%: Passive: +21% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)

Hands of House Jorasco
  • Heal +15Heal +15: Passive: +15 Competence bonus to the Heal skill.
  • Healing Lore +13%Healing Lore +13: Passive: Your Positive Energy spells gain a 13% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Insightful Heal +7Insightful Heal +7: Passive: +7 Insightful bonus to the Heal skill.
  • Equipped Healing Amplification +15Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +15 (Equipment bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Trace of MadnessTrace of Madness: You can almost hear faint, panicked voices when this item is close to you. Perhaps the latent power of this item's hint of madness could be brought out by some catalyst.

    • Named: Category:Blue augments

Brawling Gloves (level 4)
  • Strength +3 Strength +3: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +3 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Spike-StuddedSpike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.
  • Glass Jaw StrikeGlass Jaw Strike: While wearing this item, when you roll a 20 on an unarmed attack, you will deal a tremendous blow to your target that will daze it (as the Sap ability) and may knock it down as well.
  • Deception +2 Deception +2: +2 Enhancement bonus to hit and +3 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20

Brawling Gloves (level 8)
  • Strength +5 Strength +5: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Spike-StuddedSpike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.
  • Glass Jaw StrikeGlass Jaw Strike: While wearing this item, when you roll a 20 on an unarmed attack, you will deal a tremendous blow to your target that will daze it (as the Sap ability) and may knock it down as well.
  • Deception +3 Deception +3: +3 Enhancement bonus to hit and +5 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.

  • EtherealEthereal: Equipping this item causes your hands and weapons to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets.

Hammerfist
  • Insightful Doublestrike 3%Insightful Doublestrike 3%: Passive: 3% Insight bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)
  • Cannith Combat InfusionCannith Combat Infusion: Your ranged and melee attacks have a chance to cause this item to inject a Cannith Combat Infusion into your bloodstream. For the next ten seconds, this will grant a +4 Alchemical bonus to Strength, Constitution and Dexterity, as well as a 5% Alchemical bonus to your chance to doublestrike and a +2 Alchemical bonus to Armor Class.
  • Seeker +8 Seeker +8: Provides a +8 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +8 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Insightful Deadly +2Insightful Deadly +2: +2 Insight bonus to weapon damage.

  • Stormreaver's ThunderclapStormreaver's Thunderclap: This item crackles with power, flickers of lightning emenating from it. On a Melee strike of a Natural 20 that is confirmed as a critical hit, this item will strike your foe with a tremendous burst of lightning. A DC 100 Reflex save will prevent half of this damage.

  • Use Magic Device +3Use Magic Device +3: Passive: +3 Competence bonus to the Use Magic Device skill.
  • Lesser DisplacementLesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

  • Proof Against Disease +6 Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).

Gilded Gloves of Sanctity
  • Wisdom +14 Wisdom +14: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
  • Exceptional Healing Amplification +15Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +15 (Exceptional bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Divine Augmentation IX Divine Augmentation IX: Increases the wearer's caster level when casting ninth level or lower Divine spells by two.

Legendary Green Steel Weave Gloves
  • Legendary Taint of ShavarathLegendary Taint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons feed their bloodlust on enemies, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the Legendary Taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed more and more upon the wielder. Perhaps there is a way to appease this item...

Gloves of Tranquility
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Regeneration Regeneration: Causes the wearer to regenerate 1 hit point a minute using positive energy.
  • Improved Quelling StrikesImproved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: applies a Quell effect to target enemy for six seconds, rendering them unable to cast divine spells. This has a 50% chance of preventing the target from casting all spells for three seconds (12 second cooldown).

Legendary Gloves of Tranquility
  • Lesser DisplacementLesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a 25% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Strength of PurposeStrength of Purpose: You gain a +128 Enhancement Bonus to Unconsciousness Range, and regenerate 16 Hit Points using Positive Healing every 10 seconds.
  • Improved Quelling StrikesImproved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: applies a Quell effect to target enemy for six seconds, rendering them unable to cast divine spells. This has a 50% chance of preventing the target from casting all spells for three seconds (12 second cooldown).

Epic Linen Wraps
  • Strength +11 Strength +11: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +11 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Proof Against Disease +6 Proof Against Disease +6: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +6 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 7 + their Fortitude save).
  • Immunity to FearImmunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.
  • Greater Disease GuardGreater Disease Guard: This item carries the Maggot Plague disease, which deals 2d6 Constitution damage and may be contracted by enemies that hit you. A successful Fortitude Save (DC 28) will negate this effect.
  • Curse of ClumsinessCurse of Clumsiness: Passive -1 Penalty to Dexterity. (The minimum level required to equip this item is lower than normal due to this curse.)

    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14

Perfected Charged Gauntlets
  • Sovereign Lightning StrikeSovereign Lightning Strike: This item crackles with power, flickers of lightning emanating from it. On a strike of a Natural 20 that is confirmed as a critical hit, this item will strike your foe with a tremendous burst of lightning. A DC 100 Reflex save will prevent half of this damage.
  • Strength +14 Strength +14: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Speed +30% Speed +30%: +30% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 15% bonus to attack speed.
  • Electric Resistance +56Electric Resistance +56: Passive: +56 Enhancement bonus to your Electric Resistance.
  • Legendary Lightningstorm GuardLegendary Lightningstorm Guard: This item stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, striking the attacker with an incredible amount of electrical force.

Legendary Brawling Gloves (level 32)
  • Strength +14 Strength +14: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +14 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Spike-StuddedSpike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.
  • Glass Jaw StrikeGlass Jaw Strike: While wearing this item, when you roll a 20 on an unarmed attack, you will deal a tremendous blow to your target that will daze it (as the Sap ability) and may knock it down as well.
  • Deception +11 Deception +11: +11 Enhancement bonus to hit and +17 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.

    • Named: Category:Green augments

    Charges: 6 (3/day)     — 6 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • Extra Smites 2Extra Smites 2: +2 Smite Evil uses per rest. Smite Evil uses regenerate 10% faster.
  • Temperance of BeliefTemperance of Belief: You have a +1 quality bonus to Magical Resistance Rating per Religious Lore feat.
  • Sacred +9Sacred +9: An item with this quality assists only wearers who have the ability to turn undead. Sacred items provide an +9 Enhancement bonus to your effective level for Turning Undead.
  • Forbidden KnowledgeForbidden Knowledge: 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +10 Profane bonus to PRR
    4 Pieces Equipped:
    +1 Profane bonus to all ability scores
    +1 Profane bonus to attack and damage
    5 Pieces Equipped:
    +5 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +10 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +1 Profane bonus to Spell DCs
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 18 Bound to Account on Acquire, ExclusiveBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Evil We Know End chest
Absorption Gauntlet
  • Competence Elemental Resistance - 5Competence Elemental Resistance - 5: This item provides a +5 Competence bonus to your Acid, Cold, Fire, and Electrical resistances.
  • Insightful Magical Sheltering +10Insightful Magical Sheltering +10: +10 Insight bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
  • Quality Spellcraft +4Quality Spellcraft +4: Passive: +4 Quality bonus to the Spellcraft skill.
  • Fire Absorption +26% Fire Absorption +26%: Passive: 26% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Forbidden KnowledgeForbidden Knowledge: 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +10 Profane bonus to PRR
    4 Pieces Equipped:
    +1 Profane bonus to all ability scores
    +1 Profane bonus to attack and damage
    5 Pieces Equipped:
    +5 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +10 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +1 Profane bonus to Spell DCs

  • Competence Elemental Resistance - 15Competence Elemental Resistance - 15: This item provides a +15 Competence bonus to your Acid, Cold, Fire, and Electrical resistances.
  • Insightful Magical Sheltering +17Insightful Magical Sheltering +17: +17 Insight bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
  • Quality Spellcraft +5Quality Spellcraft +5: Passive: +5 Quality bonus to the Spellcraft skill.

Masterwork Gauntlet
  • Insightful Assassinate +7Insightful Assassinate +7: +7 Insight bonus to the DC of character's Assassinate attempts.
  • Quality Assassinate +3Quality Assassinate +3: +3 Quality bonus to the DC of character's Assassinate attempts.
  • Improved Deception Improved Deception: This item makes your weapons hard to focus upon and thus provides a +5 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, while using this item your weapons have a chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.
  • Dexterity Skills - Exceptional Bonus +6Dexterity Skills - Exceptional Bonus +6: Passive +6 Exceptional bonus to the Dexterity based skills of: Balance, Hide, Move Silently, Open Lock, and Tumble

    • Named: Category:Green augments
